name: Bee-Sieged: War of the Hives (W.I.P)
description:
Enter Bee-Sieged: War Of The Hives!

 

The Premise:

When the wasps invaded, there were few survivors... 

Only a handful of bees remained, hidden away, planning to use their bee-inspired arsenal to eradicate the intruders and avoid the toxic air pollution threatening their very way of life.

Who will bee the last one standing?

In this 2-player game, you and your opponent will take control of a team of bees and wasps and use your bee-inspired weapons to destroy your opposition! Run, hover or fly to maneuver yourself safely from harm's way, all while dishing back some chaotic collateral of your own!

 

How to care for your bee:

- A and D keys to move left and right

- Space to jump

- Z/X keys to hover/stop hovering

- Right Click (hold) to aim your weapon

- Right and Left Click (hold) to charge the power of the weapon

- Left Click (release) to fire your weapon

- Take out the enemy team to succeed!

 

Who are we?

ItCanBeeTemporary is a game dev team that likes making games from time to time. A bunch of us have come together to create something fun and wacky to play, and we sure hope that you'll join us on that journey.
